everyone in our family was there .

then they cut the cake and the party began .
output.sentences: The little girl was excited, it was her first time in a wedding!
The bride and groom were happy that their family joined them.
After the ceremony, the bride and groom took pictures to remember their special day.
And of course, they cut the cake together!
